:::{.page-subtitle}
This resource shows you ten core commands for basic data exploration and manipulation in Stata.</span>
:::

## Data exploration

```stata
browse
edit
describe
summarize
tabulate
list
```

## Data manipulation

```stata
generate
replace
drop
sort
gsort
```
